parameters.name: Feat
parameters.description: Name of the Live Section Plane as it appears in the FeatureManager design tree

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: 0 = Move only, then (XorDeltaX, YorDeltaY, and ZorDeltaZ) is delta vector 1 = Rotate only, then (XorDeltaX, YorDeltaY, and ZorDeltaZ) is the pivot point for rotation, (axisX, axisY, axisZ) is rotating axis

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Value by to rotate the Live Section Plane

title: IFeatureManager.MoveRotateLiveSectionPlane
description: Moves or rotates the selected Live Section Plane using the selected Live Section Plane and its manipulator.
signature:
System.Boolean MoveRotateLiveSectionPlane( 
   System.String
Feat
,
   System.Int16
Type
,
   System.Double
XorDeltaX
,
   System.Double
YorDeltaY
,
   System.Double
ZorDeltaZ
,
   System.Double
Axisx
,
   System.Double
Axisy
,
   System.Double
Axisz
,
   System.Double
Angle
)

parameters.name: Feat
parameters.description: Name of the Live Section Plane as it appears in the FeatureManager design tree

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: 0 = Move only, then (XorDeltaX, YorDeltaY, and ZorDeltaZ) is delta vector 1 = Rotate only, then (XorDeltaX, YorDeltaY, and ZorDeltaZ) is the pivot point for rotation, (axisX, axisY, axisZ) is rotating axis

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Value by to rotate the Live Section Plane

returns: True if the Live Section Plane moves or rotates, false if not
